item.text: The care providers listened to me and understood my situation
I could easily understand the information they gave me
They used information I shared in the last visit to understand my situation
After this visit, I feel supported and confident for the next step in my pregnancy
Were important things missing in the service experience?
Please briefly describe in a single message, what was missing?

answer.valueString: There was a lack of detailed information about the next steps in the care plan.
